unnormalised: As someone who went through the whole college admission process last year, I can tell you it's a bit of a circus. I remember stressing about my JEE Main score, like, will a 92 percentile be enough for NIT Trichy? Then came the counseling rounds, dates clashing, documents needed ASAP...my Aadhaar card photo looked like I hadn't slept in days! Thankfully, I got into BITS Pilani with my 12th board marks (scored 94%), but honestly, the anxiety from May '23 to August '23 almost aged me 10 yrs. Good luck to all the aspirants out there!
normalised: As someone who went through the whole college admission process last year, I can tell you it's a bit of a circus. I remember stressing about my J-E-E Main score, like, will a ninety two percentile be enough for N-I-T Trichy? Then came the counseling rounds, dates clashing, documents needed A-S-A-P...my Aadhaar card photo looked like I hadn't slept in days! Thankfully, I got into B-I-T-S Pilani with my twelfth board marks (scored ninety four percent), but honestly, the anxiety from May twenty twenty three to August twenty twenty three almost aged me ten years. Good luck to all the aspirants out there!
